FuncDef: This command creates a group interface. This interface is designed for triple-play services where multiple SAPs are part of the same subnet. A group interface may contain one or more SAPs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interface name of a group interface. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
Specifies the interface type. Values-bonding - Specifies to use connection bonding..
